content.rendered:
Directed by Tabrez Noorani

Written by Ted Caplan. Tabrez Noorani. Ritesh Shah. Alkesh Vaja

Cast Abhishek Bharate (Amar Kumar). Riya Sisodiya (Preeti). Mrunal Thakur (Sonia). Adil Hussain (Shiva). Kiran Khoje (Mother). Saroj Sharma (Teacher). Bhavik Jain (Classmate 1). Sonali Jain (Classmate 2). Rahul Goyal (Cyber CafÃ© Manager). Sai Tamhankar (Anjali). D.P. Singh (Bulky Driver (as D P Singh)). Anupam Kher (Baldev Singh). Nikita Aggarwal (Baldev Singh’s Daughter). Ankur Vikal (Hotel Manager). Abhinav Gupta (Bunty Bhai). Jagdish Pujari (Kaliya). Kanishka Aggarwal (Fiesty Brothel Girl). Nikhil Raj Nikz (Jeetu (as Nikhil Raj)). Rajkummar Rao (Manish). Shyama Shree Sherpa (Brothel Girl 2). Moumita Nandi (Brothel Girl 3). Usha Kiran Arya (Madame in Faizal’s Building). Anees Khan (Minder 1). Babu Ram (Minder 2). Tazudeen (Minder 3). Payal (Sex Worker). Ramesh (Sex Worker). Vinod (Sex Worker). Radha (Sex Worker). Simran (Sex Worker). Reshma (Naked Couple). Sam (Naked Couple). Sumisha Shankar (Baby’s Mother). Neelam (Strung-out Prostitute). Richa Chadha (Madhuri). Freida Pinto (Rashmi). Manoj Bajpayee (Faizal). Imran Qureshi (Man Beaten by Faizal). Vaishali Nagare (Woman in Sonia’s Room). Sattar Khan (Baldev’s Masseur). Anjali Khan (Young Girl in Village). Simran Bhanushali (Young Prostitute in Brothel). Deepak Mhapuskar (Old Man). Sunny Pawar (Bang Bang). Urvashi Damodkar (Madame). Dinesh Lamba (Corrupt Policeman (as Dinesh Lambha)). Ganesh Revdekar (Policeman (as Ganesh Revadekar)). Lali (Rude Prostitute). Barbie Rajput (Asha). Supra Kelkar (Doctor’s Assistent). Aditi Bahl (Female Doctor). Sana Nair (Girl in Bed with Faizal). Naresh Gosain (Fat Man). Lankesh Bhardwaj (Honest Policeman). Atmaja Pandey (Social Worker 1). Shivam Rao (Social Worker 2). Usha (Female Constable). Sagar (Male Constable). Agnelo Chang(Asian Man). Arpita Arora (Container Girl 1). Karishma Bansal (Container Girl 2). Jack Law (Asian Businessman). Amy Wu (Chinese Mama San). Barry O’Rorke (Older American Man). Wai Hung Wong(Doctor 2). Mark Lam (Bodyguard 1). Kam Yuen Tsui (Bodyguard 2). Abeo Pang(Bodyguard 3). Darwati Knutzen (Container Girl 3). Wan Yi Leung(Container Girl 4). Hung Hip Tang(Asian Courier Man). Nevin Tobias Mathew (Customs Worker (as Nevin Mathew)). Luna Rioumina (Svetlana). Konstantin Lavysh (Seller). Alexis Fitzsimons (LA Apartment / Trafficked Girl). Natalie Romo (LA Apartment / Trafficked Girl). Lily Taleb (LA Apartment / Trafficked Girl). Sasha Nasir (LA Apartment / Trafficked Girl). Zoran Korach (Bodyguard). Mark Duplass (Man in LA). Johnny Glasser (Upscale Man). Heather DePriest (Upscale Woman). Hnin Shein (Thai Daughter). Chirawat Markkern (Thai Father). Uraiwan Saengonhfa (Thai Kitchen Worker). Demi Moore (Selma). Aarti Mann (Interpreter / Jiah (as Aarti Mann)). Kirstin Masters (Minnie). Loree Rapp (Shelter Girl) . Cricknowle (Saurabh). Stefanie Peti (Handler). Jessus Zambrano (Party Guest). Kathryn Le (Party Guest (uncredited)). Shannon Murray (Bartender (uncredited)). Kelly Lynn Reiter (Party Guest (uncredited)). Linda Victoria Romo (Shelter Girl (uncredited)). Briana Thomas (Party Guest (uncredited))

Language Hindi. English

Producers Raj Acharya. Amar Butala. Nadim William George. Taylor Huang. Bei Jie Jin. H. Fisk Johnson. Ellie Kanner. Amber Kelleher-Andrews. Sanjay Kumar. Vijay Kumar. Brigitte Mueller. Deepak Nayar. Tabrez Noorani. Pravesh Sahni. Mara Burros Sandler. Nicole A. Sassaman. Rakesh Singh

Production Big Stuff. India Take One Production. Tamasha Talkie
